page.title: 09How we Relax
page.content: We wanted to find out how most people in our rectangle enjoyed themselves,to give us some idea of the{life-style} that was prevalent in the area.We soon decided that it was too complicated to find one type,so we have made a list of the kinds of things that people here do:Swim,windsurf,sail Watch T.V. Visit Cinema Ride,enter local riding events Cycling because it's so flat Play football,golf,cricket etc Most people who live here work on the land or have jobs connected with the sea.Very few people commute to places which are far away,though some do travel to London by train. The main differences,were that people didn't seem to move out of the area much,but stayed here to live most of their life.Also plenty of them were able to use the sea for{Recreation.
